name: Diceathlon
description:
A scuffed little game where you have to beat classics of yesteryear under whatever criteria the dice roll for you. Do you feel lucky?

Created by Sean "Slazo" Hickman  (@Slazoking), for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. Please leave a rating and some feedback, and sorry there wasn't a much bigger selection of classics to play from, haha.

This game uses the following assets...

  • Space Shooter art, by Kenney, licensed under CC0
  • Alien UFO pack, by Kenney, licensed under CC0
  • Splat Pack, by Kenney, licensed under CC0
  • Board Game Icons, by Kenney, licensed under CC0
  • Brown Cat With Green Eyes, by Kelvin Valerio, licensed under Pexel's "Free to use" license
  • 6 Pieces of Black and White Dice, by Pixabay, licensed under CC0
  • Aileron, by Sora Sagano, licensed under CC0

Additional thanks to the following tutorials which  I used as the base for my versions of Pong and Space Invaders.

  • Making PONG in 6 Minutes Unity Tutorial, by BMo
  • How to make Space Invaders in Unity (Complete Tutorial) 👾🛸, by Zigurous
